General.Name: Shaanxi Xinghua Chemistry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Xinghua Chemistry Co.,Ltd produces and sells ammonium nitrate products primarily in China. It also offers synthetic ammonia, methanol, methylamine, dimethylformamide, and other products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Xingping, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yong Sheng  Xi
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
